detail.item_long_desc: It is my immense pleasure to inform you that GLOBAL HEAVENS MB (Pvt) Limited has launched its newly designed web page with detailed information about the company and our products line. It has been designed to provide online services to our valued and potential clients wherefrom they would be able to acquire a great deal about the company and will be in a position to gather comprehensive information about the products and services including settlement procedure whenever any exigency arises. The new web site is versatile and vibrant and would contain updated information of the Company
